subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Tim Gleason’s overtime slapshot gave the Carolina Hurricanes a 2-1 victory over the Devils and tied their first-round series at one game apiece.
snippet: Defenseman Tim Gleason’s overtime slapshot gave the Carolina Hurricanes a 2-1 victory over the Devils and tied their first-round series at one game apiece.
